DOC.brief_title: Immune Response Hepatitis B Vaccine Challenge Dose Subjects Who Received Primary Neonatal Hepatitis B Vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Subjects investigator believe comply requirement protocol enrol study . A male female adult receive complete neonatal primary vaccination course hepatitis B vaccine primary study approximately 20 year earlier . Documented level antiHBs antibody concentration < specify concentration previous longterm time point serological result available subject . Written inform consent obtain subject . Healthy subject establish medical history clinical examination enter study . If subject female , must nonchildbearing potential childbearing potential , must practice adequate contraception 30 day prior vaccination , negative pregnancy test continue precaution 2 month completion hepatitis B challenge dose . Chronic administration ( defined 14 day ) immunosuppressant immunemodifying drug within six month prior hepatitis B vaccine challenge dose . Administration vaccine foreseen study protocol study period . Administration immunoglobulins and/or blood product study period . Drug and/or alcohol abuse .
